tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature DOUBLE,
    humidity DOUBLE,
    precipitation DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE crop_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR,
    growth_stage VARCHAR,
    growth_conditions TEXT,
    temperature_range VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE crop_information (
    crop_name VARCHAR,
    crop_type VARCHAR,
    growth_duration INT,
    optimal_temperature FLOAT,
    optimal_humidity FLOAT,
    optimal_precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_growth_analysis (
    analysis_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    crop_name VARCHAR,
    growth_date DATE,
    current_temperature FLOAT,
    current_humidity FLOAT,
    current_precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE growth_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    growth_rate FLOAT,
    growth_status VARCHAR(20)
);
